data.title: From Web Component to Lit Element
data.author: Your Name
data.description: A comprehensive tutorial on web development with Lit Element for beginners.

items.title: Introduction
items.description: Explore the fundamentals of web development and programming languages.
items.webComponentsDescription: Web Components are a set of web platform APIs that allow you to create new custom, reusable, encapsulated HTML tags to use in web pages and web apps. Custom components and widgets built on the Web Component standards will work across modern browsers and can be used with any JavaScript library or framework that works with HTML.
items.litDescription: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components that work in any framework, or with no framework at all. With Lit, you can build shareable components, applications, design systems, and more. Lit provides APIs to simplify common Web Components tasks like managing properties, attributes, and rendering.
whatYoullLearn: How to build a Web Component
What Lit does on top of a web component
whatYoullBuild: A vanilla thumbs up / down Web Component
A thumbs up / down Lit-based Web Component
whatYoullNeed: Any updated modern browser (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Chromium Edge). Web Components work in all modern browsers and polyfills are available for Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 and non-chromium Microsoft Edge.
Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Chrome DevTools.

items.title: Getting set up & exploring the Playground
items.description: Learn the basics of HTML and CSS to create the structure and style of web pages.
whatYoullBuild: A simple webpage with HTML and CSS

items.title: Define A Custom Element
items.description: Understand the fundamentals of JavaScript for adding interactivity to websites.
whatYoullBuild: A simple interactive webpage using JavaScript

whatYoullBuild: A responsive webpage with Shadow DOM

items.title: HTML Templates
items.description: Explore popular web frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js.

items.title: Adding Functionality
items.description: Understand the basics of server-side development and databases.

items.title: Lit-html
items.description: Learn different strategies for deploying web applications.

items.title: LitElement
items.description: Learn version control using Git for tracking changes in your projects.
whatYoullLearn: Introduction to version control with Git

items.title: Children
items.description: Understand the fundamentals of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for websites.

items.title: Congratulations
items.description: Learn about the importance of web accessibility and how to implement it in your projects.
